name: Moon Stuff
description:
Controls : 

AWSD to move ; M to mute ; J to increase and K (or H) to decrease your speed ; R to restart

Game was made in 4 days!

Investigate the space. Read interesting things about moon stuff! Enjoy!

This is my first Unity game and I am so happy to show it to you! 

Follow my work - you will not regret it!

Comment your experience!
